page.title: 11THE ABBEY GATEWAY MUSEUM
page.content: The{Abbey Gateway}has been open for 4 years. Altogether there are about 350 items in the museum. They get so much that they mount up every year. On average about{100}people come in every{week}and about{6/7000}every {year.}It is run by 60 volunteers 28 of whom will be found there in any one week. { The Malvern Museum Society}opened in 1979 and is a registered charity.It acts as a body of trustees to protect the Museum. Membership of{Malvern Museum {Association}gives free entry to the museum and winter lectures.A news- letter is sent quarterly,outings and other activities are also arranged. The Museum will have its problems in the future because it needs{Â£45,000 for repairs to the structure of the building.
